text: chartered public schools transportation schedules amend rsa v to read as follows attendance at a chartered public school for the purposes of transportation shall not constitute assignment under the provisions of rsa and rsa pupils who reside in the school district in which the chartered public school is located shall be provided transportation to that school by the district on the same terms and conditions as provided for public schools in the district and utilizing the same regular bus schedules and routes that are provided to pupils attending public schools within that district a resident school district shall not use bus routes for chartered public school students which include transfer stations depots or terminals where students take multiple buses to travel to and from their chartered public school unless the use of such transfer stations depots or terminals also applies to the transportation of public school students in the district
